lead_paragraph: LYONS--Stanley, 92, died peacefully January 14 after a long illness. Beloved husband of Marion, cherished uncle of Cindy, Eric, Michael, Tom and Carol. Loved music, travel, skiing and led a full life. Donations to NCJW NY Hunger programs, VNSNY Hospice and Palliative Care. Services Sunday, 12pm, at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel. 1/3
